Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear Customer
Thank you for contacting our Customer Analytics & Reporting team. Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}. We are investigating your query and will respond to you shortly.
If you wish to provide additional information, including any attachments or require a follow up please respond directly to this email as it will automatically link all emails to this case for ease of tracking and to avoid duplication.
We look forward to speaking with you soon.
Thank you, Customer Analytics & Reporting Team {!Case.Thread_Id}
